name: Were Are You
description:
Were Are You is a contemplative storytelling game, written by Superdillin in collaboration with Mythic Grove, about searching for your missing werewolf lover. Playable both as a collaborative game with friends or as a solo journaling adventure, your love has just been turned and has gone missing under the Full Moon. Along your journey to find them before the next Full Moon rises, you’ll remember who they were and discover who they might become.

More of Dillin and their work!

http://Superdillin.com

http://Superdillin.itch.io

https://Twitter.com/superdillin

Published by Mythic Grove

https://www.mythicgroveproductions.com/
